DispelsAreBuffSafe.Description: Dispel Magic, Greater Dispel Magic, and Slayer Dispelling Attacks should no longer dispel buffs on the casters allies or debuffs on enemies.

UnlimitedSorcererBloodlineClaws.Description: Abyssal and Draconic sorcerer bloodline power claws no longer have a use limit.

CombineSorcererDragonClaws.Description: Combine all sorcerer dragon bloodline claw powers into the same ability, stacking elemental damage from each bloodline.

DawnOfDragons.Description: Converts the Holy Aura you get from siding with the silver dragon in Dawn Of Dragons to a feature from a permabuff to make it harder to lose and clear what is up. Does not work if quest completed already. See additional settings in Content Modifications tab.

MovanicDevasWeaponFix.Description: Fixes Movanic Devas to greatswords as per TT rather than longswords wielded in both hands, making their damage quite a bit less bad.

RestoreEarlyCures.Description: Purifier loses its cure spells but gains absolutely nothing relative to stock oracle before level 5. This restores CLW/CMW access.

CelestialArmorTraining.Description: Purifier's Celestial Armor unique revelation now grants advanced armor training access. Note: Absolutely Requires Tabletop Tweaks Base.

ReturnStigmatizedWitchPatron.Description: Moves stigmatized out of the suck by cancelling the patron removal. By default, this will give Ember the Endurance Patron when first met

EmberHasHealingPatron.Description: Gives Ember the Healing patron instead. Requires Return Stigmatized Witch Patron to be active

EmberHasElementsPatron.Description: Gives Ember the Elements patron instead. Requires Return Stigmatized Witch Patron to be active
